documents.document: So excited for Super Bowl this weekend! Party time 🍻🍕🎉🐔 #SuperBowlLI
Should be a cracking derby next Sunday after that impressive win by Hearts. Decided not to go so will be watching from or behind the sofa!
Great day out at the football with D. Road trip and win to boot. Top of the league #GGTTH #Hibees https://t.co/3QwdxDK939
Road trip with D to Dumfries for the Hibs game! Hoping for a win so the 80 mile trip is worth it #Hibees #ggtth #QotSFCvHFC
Hearts away it is, bring it on! Great memories from last season, hope to be lucky with tickets again! #ggtth #scottishcup
Love this! Imported especially from Wisconsin by D. Not wearing it tonight though! #cheesehead #packers https://t.co/C77uGJWEKB
All set for a trip to Dumfries with D ⚽️#hibees #palmerston https://t.co/U5BavRWmto
Not to be for the Packers tonight. Falcons were fierce #GBvsATL
Excited for my second team's game tonight and loving my new bobble hat #GoPackGo https://t.co/sRmIUG6fNt
What a draw, could be epic again but maybe Raith will do us a favour first #Hibees
Good day out yesterday and first time I've seen Hibs hit 8. Interesting banter with the Bonnyrigg fans especially t… https://t.co/aozgtgV0UZ
@HibsOfficial anyone at home #GGTTH
Mason Crosby 🧀👏🏻
Chilli cheese dog and beers setting us up nicely for the NFL. Go Packers 🧀 #GoPackGo
@HibsOfficial ticket website is a nightmare. I finally got my tickets after multiple website crashes and timeouts. It needs fixed!
Hail Aaron #packers #gopackgo
It's not easy being green #packers
Hoping for #Steelers and #Packers wins tonight in the play offs. Big Ben and Aaron rock #SteelersNation #GoPackGo
Long weekend off started with a Hibs win, off to North Berwick for lunch today with friends then NFL playoffs tonight. Go #Raiders
Brilliant performance from the Hibees tonight. Top of the league and outclassed our main rivals. Great start to the weekend #ggtth #hibees
Backing the Packers at Detroit but don't think I can stay up to watch the whole game since it's a late one! #packernation #GoPackGo
Regular Sunday night NFL marathon tonight. Needless to say I am supporting the Dolphins 🐬 in the first game! #NFL #FinsUp
Great end to the year for the mighty Hibees. Top of the league again. Now time to push on and get this league won #hibees #hibbynewyear
Long weekend off work 😁 and airport bound!#hurrahforholidays #happyholidays
I've sent a donation and I hope it helps even if it's just a little bit. #dollywoodfoundation #MyPeopleFund #SomePlaceSpecial
Devastating wildfires in the Smokies have destroyed the cabin we stayed in 5 weeks ago. I feel awful for the wonder… https://t.co/75PdLKMtKl
One way to stop me watching football, have Chris Sutton as a pundit #motd
Onwards and upwards Hibs! Now time to enjoy the weekend 🙌 #Hibees
Poor tonight from Hibs, missing McGinn and Fyvie massively #Hibees
Friday night football. Come on the mighty Hibees #ggtth #hibees
Tough to read about the devastating wildfires in the Smoky Mountains. Only a month ago we were there. Hope everyone is safe #GSMNP #Smokies
Just like a pair of kids tonight. Not sure how we missed Utah and South Carolina on our travels #scratchmap… https://t.co/y4zdnwyaQk
Weekend away with my besties, Sunday night football with D and Monday off. Win, win, win!!
Watching the Thanksgiving triple bill football with our feast. Longest national anthem ever at the Vikings game by Aretha Franklin #NFL
Woke up to find this in my kitchen this morning! Looks amazing! #pecanpie #thanksgiving #pretendingtobeamerican https://t.co/3YKxgKRRJs
Wondering if I'll ever feel warm again!Thank you Hibs for a brilliant performance. Let's get this league won! #hibees #topoftheleague
Spent the morning making chutney, what on earth is happening to me?! Time to tap into my tomboy side and go to the football #Hibees
Eh not at Hibs! Still paying Premiership prices!! Price of Football 2016: Scottish season-ticket prices fall https://t.co/0u3ZBalOfo
Donald Trump wins Menie golf course flag pole wrangle - BBC News Surely he has more pressing things to deal with? https://t.co/RhFETJZehS
Ah well dropped points but still top of the league. Come on the mighty Hibees #hibees
Forgotten about Scotland, it's all about the night Hibees today!! Top of the league #Hibees
Times like this I wish I had cable. This coverage is shocking. #stv #SCOvENG
Time for some NFL now. Trying to keep our holiday spirits going!
Watched a full rerun of the @Cubs win in game seven against the Indians. Wow, it was a belter! The curse is broken #cubs #WorldSeries
Andy Murray at number one, a massive achievement in this particular era. Surely Scotland's (ahem Britain's) greatest ever sportsperson.
Follow your arrow wherever it points.
Watching the rugby but I'm afraid it's not a patch on the NFL for excitement, skill and competitiveness #WalvAus #NFL
I'm sure there will be a huge party in Chicago when the #Cubs arrive home! There certainly was when Hibs broke their 114 year drought #Hibs
They did it!! Congrats @Cubs hope it was worth the wait #WorldSeries #Cubs
Go Cubs Go! Believe and smash game seven!!!! Wish we were still in the US to watch he decider live. #WorldSeries #GoCubsGo
Good win today from the Hibees, worth freezing for. Struggling with the jet lag now 😴😴😴
Timehop! 8 years between these pictures. D looks practically the same, me not so much. For future we need to adopt… https://t.co/Qdox4L9W12
Dragging myself out of bed to go to the game today so Hibs had better win! Jet lag in full force 😩😴 Come on Hibs! #hibees
Back from an epic trip. Loved the Smoky Mountains and we were lucky enough to be there for the peak fall foliage. P… https://t.co/AmUQrhTJTP
Last day of this trip to the US. 20 states now visited, 30 from completing the set #dream Maybe we should emigrate?!
Every mountain top is within reach if you just keep climbing. Off to explore Clingmans Dome today #SmokyMountains #NorthCarolina #tenessee
Relaxing for a few days in the Smoky Mountains before heading home. After all our adventures we've now visited 20 states, 30 to go! #dream
Waiting on our flight to Charleston before we go to see Garth Brooks tonight. Soooooo excited!!! Hope it's worth the two flight detour!
Midweek beers and food in a Memphis bar, can't decide if everyone is just really drunk or really likes music. It's crazy!
Hello Memphis. Downtown location, on the trolley route and a few minutes walk away from the Mississippi. Shame it's only 17 degrees- brrrrr!
Goodbye sleepy Clarksdale, we have enjoyed staying here and exploring Mississippi. On to Memphis now #roadtrip #deepsouth #chevycruzein
Now for some baseball. Go #Cubs If #Hibs can win the Scottish Cup the Cubs can win the World Series. Believe!
Interesting watching the #PresidentialDebate live. It's hard to believe the choice for the voters is either of these two candidates.
@Oldmanmackie absolutely! If you believe everything they claim in the ads it's frightening to think either of them will be President.
It seems you can say whatever you wish about your rival. All a bit odd! Hillary ahead in polls as Trump's claims get wilder and wilder.
Finding these negative commercials approved by the two presidential candidates featured daily on US television very odd viewing!
Fire alarm testing at Caesars Palace has been going on for ages! Good job we don't have a raging hangover 😂
It's time to go to Las Vegas! Holiday 🌞🇺🇸🍹🎉
@on_lothianbuses maybe you could remind the driver of the number 6 that there is a stop on St Mary's Street that people want to get on at!
Midday football on a Sunday- wrong! Come on the mighty Hibees, let's get back to the top of the league! #hibees #ggtth
Rangers statement 😂 If strict liability was enforced they'd be in deep trouble for singing sectarian songs and use of smoke bombs #Rangers
@CaesarsPalace 2 weeks and this will be my view!! #lasvegas #caesarspalace
@Oldmanmackie it's cringe! Honestly some of them are living in the dark ages!!
@OsiUmenyiora was right then, the Pats really can win with anyone playing QB. Who needs Tom Brady? #nfl #patriots
Back to work after an epic weekend including a wedding, catching up with old friends, holiday planning and flight booking #workinforalivin
@OurDaybyDesign @Oldmanmackie third that! Let's get this Christmas gathering at ours planned!
Sunday night football and fizz with D. Hurrah for Mondays off work 🏈 #nfl #Rams #Seahawks
Can't wait to see @garthbrooks in Charleston, WV. Had tickets for Dublin but happy to travel the extra miles from Edinburgh to WV!
Charleston, WV here we come. #GarthBrooks
Meanwhile, more importantly, congrats to Lenny and Jason for their awards this month. Let's keep this unbeaten run going #hibees #ggtth
More embarrassing press statements from Rangers. When will they accept that some of their fans are just as bad as those they are condemning?
Watching the Scotland game and struggling to recognise most of the team. Seriously, is this the best team we have?
First home game of the season today and it should be a cracker with a huge crowd. Come on Hibs, we can win this league #ggtth #hibees
Off work today, lucky enough to watch the 10000m live and was in awe of the world record from Ayana. Barely a mention tonight #rio2016
First game of the season today. Come on Hibs, you can do it! Let's get the league won this year please #hibees
What a hit. Suddenly it's livened up a bit! #Euro2016Final
Would have been a completely different game if it had been Wales v Germany. Can't think of a duller final #euro2016
Serena is awesome! Love watching her and so happy she has made it to 22. Inspiring at aged 34 to keep winning slams. Greatest ever #Serena
Come on Germany! You can do this #EURO2016
ITV coverage is awful but unfortunately has to be watched tonight! Come on Wales #Euro2016 #TogetherStronger
@Oldmanmackie yeah he shouted mine then punched his own player instead of the ball! Ooops! Thought Iceland did well second half!
@Oldmanmackie was hoping for a comeback but not likely now! Shame the goalkeeper punched his defender instead of gathering the ball!
Iceland comeback?! #EURO2016
France looking strong here. Can't see Iceland winning this one unfortunately! #EURO2016
Nooooo, Italy are out. Some of those penalties though 🙈 Pelle and Zaza blew it #EURO2016
Dare to dream and don't be afraid to fail ❤️
Just realised my husband is older than Taylor Hicks. Eeeek!
Italy & Wales for the final #euro2016 https://t.co/YfKfCYj9m3
@markchapman Tell Robbie and John that if you're a proper football fan you plan your holidays around fixtures even if they seem unlikely!
@Oldmanmackie @Tonester_7 such a shame for Ramsey. Wales will win, Belgium are much better than Portugal and Wales just bossed them!
